item.title: Having a few problems read here plz
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

make npcs talk in npc handler, search for moo and copy that part and paste it right below it, change the moo to whatever you want, i dont have a server on me so i cant remember how to make em talk by like clicking em. hmm a command to add 100 party hats, if you meen of the same kind it would be like

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("gimmephats") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("your name here")) { addItem(1041,100) }
again, i dont have a server on me so that might not be exactly right, npcs health coming back happens if the hp is set to high, try checking the npcâ€™s health in npc.cfg, the left number is health
